The '''Princeps Cretaceus Chapter''' is [[Albedo]]'s [[Story Quest]].

==Act I: Traveler Observation Report==
{{Main|Traveler Observation Report}}
{{Description|The Chief Alchemist of the [[Knights of Favonius]] devotes his energies to exploring the secrets of the world and the life within it.<br />The limitless horizons of knowledge should not be limited to [[Teyvat]]. But even the best researchers in the seven nations struggle to collect samples of life from "beyond" for their reference.<br />&mdash;Perhaps the one who has come from far beyond the skies is the ideal subject for his observation?}}
# [[The Rumored Alchemist]]
# [[The Genius Researcher and the Seed of Another World]]
# [[The First Experiment: Elements]]
# [[The Second Experiment: The World]]
# [[The Third Experiment: Life]]
# [[The Final Experiment: Withering Glory]]
